content.rendered:
Twin Palms Sungai Long is located in Kuala Lumpur, near the SILK Highway with easy access from the Sungai Besi and Besraya Highways. This freehold gated residential development features 603 units of exquisite bungalows, semi-detached houses and superlink homes.

It is currently being developed in nine phases, with each named after a genus of palm. The nine initials spell out the namesake of this prestigious property, Twin Palms.

Spread over a sprawling 126 acres of naturally undulating land, this resort-style development is well-equipped with lifestyle amenities such as an infinity pool, gymnasium, exercise stations, multi-purpose hall and also a children’s playground. Twin Palms Sungai Long is a perfect enclave for families seeking tranquility while having access to the many amenities available right at their doorsteps.
